author: bruno
msg: Added a static setupComponent method that takes a ServiceManager instead of a ComponentManager

author: stephan
msg: Throwing an exception instead of using AvalonToCocoonSource to
remove the dependency to the deprecated package.

author: jefft
msg: Changes to make CLI output more cron-friendly:
- Exit status set to 1 if any broken links are encountered
- Lines longer than 70 chars are not wrapped
- Broken links are reported with a line starting with 'X' instead of '*'
